message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.CR 

This paper is about image segmentation, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The paper proposes a new approach that combines conditional random fields (CRFs) and decision trees, which involves learning nonparametric potentials. This suggests that the paper may also belong to the machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper involves optimization techniques, which could place it in the constraint satisfaction and optimization (cs.CR) sub-category. Finally, the paper involves modelling label relationships, which could also place it in the natural language processing (cs.CL) sub-category.
